normal.description: A luxurious bake. Cracks through the golden outer skin reveal a medley of rosy ham and bright vegetables. How tantalizing!
normal.effect: Revives the selected character. Restores 1,200 HP.

delicious.description: A luxurious bake. The scent is so rich and heavenly. You'll only be done once you lick the plate clean.
delicious.effect: Revives the selected character. Restores 1,500 HP.

suspicious.description: A somewhat luxurious looking bake. By looking at it, no-one can tell what it is made of... or what it lacks.
suspicious.effect: Revives the selected character. Restores 900 HP.
